summary: Batman, with the help of the Flash, Green Arrow, Nightwing, and Red Robin, has to try and get to the bottom of the mysterious robotic animals attacking Gotham.
cast: Roger Craig Smith|Chris Diamantopoulos|Will Friedle|Charlie Schlatter|Yuri Lowenthal|Dana Snyder|John DiMaggio|Keith Szarabajka|Laura Bailey|Phil LaMarr|Richard Epcar|Alastair Duncan|Amanda Troop|Matthew Mercer|Eric Bauza|Mo Collins|Keith Ferguson
keywords: nightwing character|supervillainess|killer croc character|male police officer|grapnel gun
title: Batman Unlimited: Instinto animal
